snippet: State transportation officials must decide by July 10 whether the new eastern stretch of the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge is ready to open on Labor Day.
abstract: California transportation officials must decide whether new eastern stretch of San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge is ready to open on Labor Day; problems surrounding seismic bolts in new stretch and lingering questions about other issues present Californians with unattractive options for most expensive infrastructure project in state's history.
lead_paragraph: State transportation officials must decide by July 10 whether the new eastern stretch of the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge is ready to open on Labor Day.

headline.main: In California, Bolts May Hold Up a Bridge in More Ways Than One
headline.print_headline: In California, Bolts May Hold Up A Bridge in More Ways Than One
